Class FileSystemTree

extends java.lang.Object
    Representation of file-system class.

      • search

        private void search​(java.lang.String token,
                    FileSystemTree.FileNode node,
                    java.lang.StringBuilder str)
        Search given token and build a StringBuilder related to its path.

        It is a tail recursion , traversing is preordered.

        Parameters:
        token - Searched token.
        node - A starting node for searching.
        str - StringBuilder that will be built.

      • printFileSystem

        private void printFileSystem​(FileSystemTree.FileNode node,
                             int depth,
                             java.lang.StringBuilder str)
        Print the whole file system recursively.
        Parameters:
        node - A starting node for traversing on the system.
        depth - initial depth of system , it enhances the output format of file.
        str - StringBuilder that will be built.
